subject: Basketball
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Gregg Popovich and the Spurs were rewarded for their faith in Manu Ginobili with his 24-point performance and a 3-2 lead in the N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Gregg Popovich and the Spurs were rewarded for their faith in Manu Ginobili with his 24-point performance and a 3-2 lead in the N.B.A. finals.
